message: We exit the room and head down the hall, taking care not to let the tower's shaking knock us off our feet.

name: ノイズ
message: "You okay? You didn't look too hot in there."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah, I'm a lot better now. ...Wait, isn't this building about to collapse?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Probably."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Did you do that?"

name: ノイズ
message: "No, wasn't me."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Then who..."

name: ノイズ
message: "Beats me... Maybe it's a miracle or something."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Not much of a miracle if it takes us with it."

name: ノイズ
message: "That's why we're gonna escape, right?"
We walk along, supporting each other, until we reach a small elevator at the end of the corridor.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hey, look."
We try pushing the call button.
...The door opens.

name: ノイズ
message: "Looks like an emergency elevator. Should take us to the bottom."
We step inside and push the button for the first floor.
The elevator begins to descend, shaking along with the tower's vibrations.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...I really hope we don't get stuck."

name: ノイズ
message: "You can say that again."
Despite our fears, the elevator reaches the first floor without incident.
